column2: "you are reading a list of neutral comments on a tablet product review. Summarize the the top things they disliked/did not like/did not apprciate about the product",

"- Limited access to free Kindle books for Amazon Prime members
- Unavailability of some popular games/apps like Plants vs Zombies 2
- Inadequate battery life
- Operating system is buggy with occasional crashes and requiring rebooting
- Limited app selection compared to other Android tablets"
